description: Sumith Amarawickrama Vs. Assistant Commissioner for Agrarian and Two Others before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: Sumith Amarawickrama Vs. Assistant Commissioner for Agrarian and Two Others
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
keywords: Is an application by an aggrieved party for the execution of an order made by a magistrate under section 8(2) of the Act tantamount to an application under section 8(1) of the act by the commissioner general of agrarian services? Is that so? should such an application be made only by the Commissioner General of Agrarian Development and not the Aggrieved Party
legistation: Article 138 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka-The Agrarian Development Act No. 46 of 2000 (as amended) Sections 8(1), 8(2) and 101.
